comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

I suspect the problem is caused by the html code below.

Your privacy, your choice

We use essential cookies to make sure the site can function. We also use optional cookies for advertising, personalisation of content, usage analysis, and social media.

By accepting optional cookies, you consent to the processing of your personal data - including transfers to third parties. Some third parties are outside of the European Economic Area, with varying standards of data protection.

See our privacy policy for more information on the use of your personal data.

for further information and to change your choices.

comment.body: Hello. Unfortunately, I can't check this page because when registering, the site asks for data that I don't have. Please switch off all third party extensions and leave only AdGuard, try to disable stealth mode filters/features one by one and when you find which one is causing the problem leave it alone. Open the filter log, refresh the page with the problematic filter and send a screenshot of the filter log in the comments of this issue on github.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Yes, the widget filter blocks third-party widgets that are not essential for the functioning of websites or for interaction with them. [Link to our filter policy](https://adguard.info/kb/general/ad-filtering/filter-policy/#adguard-widgets-filter)
You can add this rule in user rules to unblock this widget or disable widget filter completely if you want to see widgets.
```
irliepaja.lv#@#.weather-widget
@@||gismeteo.*/getInformer/$domain=irliepaja.lv 
```

### 필터 업데이트를 하신 후에도 작동이 안된다면, 아래 이메일로 문의해주세요. ### 도움이 필요하시면, [filters@adguard.com](mailto:filters@adguard.com) 으로 문의해주세요. > [!IMPORTANT] > [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ko/adguard-android/overview.html)인 경우에는 List-KR 필터와 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에 대한 HTTPS 필터링이 활성화되어있는지 확인해주세요. 또한, 캐시, 쿠키 및 사이트 데이터 삭제 또한 도움이 됩니다. _Google Play 스토어에 있는 [AdGuard Content Blocker](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.android.contentblocker&hl=ko)로는 차단이 어렵습니다._ > [!IMPORTANT] > 또한, AdGuard 유료 라이선스 없이 AdGuard for iOS를 사용하시는 분들은 점점 광고 차단하기 어려워질 수 있으니, [stacksocial.com](https://www.stacksocial.com/sales/adguard-family-plan-lifetime-subscription)에서 구입하신 뒤에 Safari 고급 보호 및 List-KR 필터를 활성화해주세요. > [!TIP] > AdGuard for Android에서 설정 탭 -> 일반 -> 앱과 필터 업데이트 -> 필터 자동 업데이트 값을 1시간으로 줄일 수 있습니다. --- ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.fmkorea.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.fmkorea.com) ### Comment > 에펨코리아 홈페이지 광고 차단 우회 생겼습니다. 막아주세용ㅠ Username: `@없음` ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
If you see adblock detection, then you can just add:
```adblock
superbarca77.*,superargo77.*,superleo77.*,superlee77.*,superdom77.*,superabbit33.*,live-streamfootball.*,superabbit77.*,rbtv77.*#@$#div[class*=" "] > img[src^="http"]:first-child:has(+ div > img) { visibility: hidden !important; z-index: -1 !important; position: absolute !important; }
```
Ads will be not hidden, but there shouldn't be anti-adblock popup.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.nlziet.nl](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.nlziet.nl) ### Comment > Live channels are not working. > > The problem is in the AdGuard Cookie notice filter. If i disable it, there is no problem. But i found the cookie that causes the problem. > > If i deblock > > ||cookie-cdn.cookiepro.com/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js > > it is working as it should be. See screenshot 2 and 4. Screenshot 4 is the filter i made via filterlog, as you can see in screenshot 2. > > Problem is only in the browser. comment.body:
> If you see adblock detection, then you can just add to user rules:
> 
> ```
> superbarca77.*,superargo77.*,superleo77.*,superlee77.*,superdom77.*,superabbit33.*,live-streamfootball.*,superabbit77.*,rbtv77.*#@$#div[class*=" "] > img[src^="http"]:first-child:has(+ div > img) { visibility: hidden !important; z-index: -1 !important; position: absolute !important; }
> ```
> 
> Ads will be not hidden, but there shouldn't be anti-adblock popup.

I think they changed it again recently
